attributes.action: Remove 4x4s from London and Surrounding Areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 4x4s are creating more carbon emmisions on london roads than any other vehicle however there not needed in london when was the last time you were in london and had to drive through a field to get where you were going? what is the point of them other than farming or as they were built for (off road use) help save the planet sign this petition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
